import {React,useEffect,useContext,useState} from 'react' import Carousel from '../carousel' import './product.css' import noteContext from '../noteContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Spinner from '../spinner'; import ReactStars from 'react-rating-stars-component' const Productitem = (props) => { const context=useContext(noteContext) const {showproductdetail,product,isLoading}=context; const {id}=useParams() const [quantity,setquantity]=useState(1) const option={ edit:false, color:"rgba(20,20,20,0.1)", activeColor:"tomato", value: product.rating || 0, isHalf:true, size: "30" } const fetchproductdetail=async()=>{ await showproductdetail(id) } useEffect(()=>{ fetchproductdetail() },[]) return ( <> { isLoading ? ( ) : (

{product.name}

Product #{product._id}
{`( ${product.totalreview} Reviews )`}
â‚¹{product.price}
Status:0 ? "green" :"red" ,fontWeight:"600",marginLeft:"5px"}}>{ product.stock>0 ? "InStock" : " Out of Stock"}

Description:

{product.description}

Submit Review

Reviews

{ product.review && product.revie }
)} ) } export default Productitem
